review_data.title: Must try!
review_data.content: Small but beautiful very original Korean restaurant with wonderful food. Was there to celebrate Chuseok (Korean Thanksgiving) with a group of 15 people. Simply delicious.

review_data.title: Delicious original Korean Food
review_data.content: Having found trough a internet forum we found this small but super delicious Korean restaurant. Having tried a lot of other Korean restaurants in Switzerland, this is the best of all. Food is ver tasty and fresh. Do take your time to read the story...More

review_data.title: Tasty Korean food- great place for lunch!
review_data.content: Went there and try out their special lunch box- definitely worth a pass-by if you are in the area. There is also a cosy outside seating area for the sunny days!
